description: The Stingwing Midge is a small, agile insect with translucent wings that beat so rapidly they create a faint hum. It is known for its venomous stinger, which can cause intense pain and mild paralysis.

traits.name: Venomous Sting
traits.description: When the Stingwing Midge successfully hits with its sting attack, the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: If the Stingwing Midge is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.
